about.title: About Dr. Gürkan Eryanılmaz
about.subtitle: Dedicated to Excellence in Orthopedic Care
about.missionText: To provide world-class orthopedic care with compassion, utilizing the latest medical technologies and techniques to help patients achieve optimal mobility and quality of life.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive orthopedic care tailored to your needs

arthroscopy.title: Arthroscopic Surgery
arthroscopy.description: Minimally invasive joint surgery using advanced arthroscopic techniques for faster recovery and better outcomes.

replacement.title: Joint Replacement Surgery
replacement.description: Complete joint replacement procedures for hip, knee, and shoulder using the latest prosthetic technologies.

trauma.title: Trauma & Fractures
trauma.description: Emergency orthopedic care and complex fracture repair with state-of-the-art surgical techniques.

pediatric.title: Pediatric Orthopedics
pediatric.description: Specialized care for children's orthopedic conditions including hip dysplasia and developmental disorders.

sports.title: Sports Injuries
sports.description: Comprehensive treatment for athletic injuries with focus on safe return to sport activities.

nerve.title: Joint & Nerve Surgery
nerve.description: Advanced procedures for joint problems and nerve compression syndromes.

services.consultationDescription: Contact Dr. Eryanılmaz to discuss your orthopedic needs and treatment options.

symptoms.title: Symptoms & Conditions
symptoms.subtitle: Learn about common orthopedic conditions and their treatments
symptoms.conditionDescription: Contact Dr. Eryanılmaz for a comprehensive evaluation of your specific orthopedic concerns.
